about_the_game:
Taking influences from the golden era of adventure films and moods of mid 20th century exotica, we hope this soundtrack will evoke images of adventure, secluded beaches, exotic birds and hidden mystery!

The soundtrack is composed by Anders Af Klintberg.
Additional tracks are made by John Turesson, Daniel Molin and Jonas Persson.
